name: REC | Automated RDE Upload from Google Drive to Salesforce | Find and Process Files or Shortcuts | 3 of 3

input.code:
# 1. RETRIEVE INPUT
files = input['files'] || []

# 2. DEFINE PRIORITY MAP
priority_map = {
  "booked" => 1,
  "primary approved quoted" => 2,
  "primary approved" => 3,
  "primary not approved" => 4
}

processed_opportunities = {}

# 3. LOOP AND PROCESS
files.each do |file|
  next unless file['name']
  
  filename = file['name']
  
  # Regex Logic:
  # ^(.*?)-  -> Captures status from the start up to the first dash
  # .*?Opp\s -> Moves through the string until it finds "Opp "
  # (\d+)    -> Captures the digits (Opportunity Number)
  match_data = filename.match(/^(.*?)-.*?Opp\s(\d+)/i)
  
  if match_data
    status_raw = match_data[1].strip
    opp_number = match_data[2]
  else
    next # Skip if the pattern isn't found
  end

  # --- METADATA EXTRACTION ---
  modified_time = file['modifiedTime']
  mime_type = file['mimeType']
  is_shortcut = (mime_type == 'application/vnd.google-apps.shortcut')

  # Criteria 1: Filter Status
  next unless status_raw.match?(/primary|booked/i)
  priority_rank = priority_map[status_raw.downcase] || 99

  # Create the candidate object
  candidate = {
    file_id: file['id'],
    file_name: filename,
    status: status_raw,
    priority_rank: priority_rank,
    opportunity_number: opp_number,
    webViewLink: file['webViewLink'],
    modified_time: modified_time,
    mime_type: mime_type,
    is_shortcut: is_shortcut
  }

  # Criteria 2: Comparison Logic (Deduplication)
  existing = processed_opportunities[opp_number]

  if existing.nil? || candidate[:priority_rank] < existing[:priority_rank]
    processed_opportunities[opp_number] = candidate
  end
end

# 4. RETURN OUTPUT
{
  results: processed_opportunities.values
}
